meaningMnemonic: When you <kanji>repair</kanji> things for a <kanji>reason</kanji>, you'll be able to <vocabulary>repair</vocabulary> just about anything! Just remember, always be repairing for a reason.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
